title: Variable Converter
description: Write a program that asks the user to input their name and age, stores the name as a string and the age as an integer, then prints out a greeting message with the name and age. The program should also convert the age to a float and print out the age with two decimal places.
sample_output:
Hello, John Doe! You are 25 years old.
Your age as a float is: 25.00
